content: this wonderful crochet blanket is a sweet addition to any nursery or playroom stitched in soft bernat baby blanket this star-shaped layer of warmth is worked in the round in double_crochet and features simple shaping and increases designed in soothing multi-shades of blue it s perfect to lull baby into dreamland but you can make your version in any shades to match your color scheme it s a gift that really stands out
